file_content.text: Zash, has your research turned up anything else on this Taris ghost?
Zash is not here. I have beat her back. I am ready to serve you.
Figures the old lady isn't around when we need her.
She is a plague, a thief of my flesh.
I'm sorry, but I need to speak with her.
Please, I need Zash.
I'm sorry, master, but I can't obey. I will not give over my identity to an intruder.
She's more useful to me than you are. Let me speak with her.
Shut up and give me Zash.
No. I will not obey. I will not give over my identity to an intruder.
You are bound to obey me, monster. Obey.
That was not a request.
I am powerless to disobey, but I will remember this.
Thank you. It's such a relief to have the use of my faculties.
If you won't let me speak with her, I guess I'll just have to force her out.
Try again. [Shock him]
Aggghhh! I will remember this....
Thank you. That was just the opening I needed.
You have no idea how disconcerting it is to be pushed to the recesses of your own consciousness.
But you didn't call me here because you missed my company. What is it you need?
You said you knew something about a ghost on Taris.
Tell me about the ghost.
Have you managed to find any more information about the Taris ghost?
We've arrived on Taris.
Ah, yes. I did manage to sneak in a little extra fact-finding before I, um, lost my bearings.
What was the name of your contact on this planet again?
Your servant on Taris....
Ah, we've arrived on Taris, then. Excellent. His name is Elios Maliss. He's Sith. Sniveling, but obedient.
It seems the ghost you're after was once a Sith from Darth Malak's invasion force that destroyed Taris a few hundred years ago.
The ghost was one of the Sith left to die during the final bombardment, for some spiteful reason or another. We're all trigger-happy sometimes.
Do you know anything else?
Is that all?
Don't any Sith ever die of natural causes?
All Sith are murdered then?
Most Sith don't see fifty.
I don't know how we expect to wipe the Jedi from the galaxy when we keep killing ourselves.
It makes us all look bad.
With luck, they'll be so shocked they won't know what to make of us.
Elios Maliss at the Imperial base will be able to tell you more. If he forgets his manners, remind him you're my successor.
You're right, Khem Val. We must find a way to cope without her. What did she say about Taris?
Never mind, then.
We can cope without her. What did she say about Taris?
It's alright. We'll make do.
Something about some Jedi investigating an old Sith ghost. Said she had a Sith on the planet looking into it. Elios Maliss, I think.
Surprised there's only one ghost. Story goes some crazy Darth blew the whole planet to pieces while his own Sith were still on it.
Not very practical, but it ain't my business. Anyway, I'd hunt out this Maliss guy in the Imperial base and hope he has some answers.
